name: Texted
description:
This is the story of Alexandre, an 17 years old boy who hungers for adventure but... Something is wrong with the kingdom of Cydonia, your task is to help Alexandre save the kingdom. 

You can have a happy ending or die in your path if you make bad choices. The sound of the game will be added in a future release.
I tried to make a simple and enjoyable story so you can rest between games.
Have fun!
